content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** released twice with slightly different yarn and hook suggestions and stitch counts both version have identical finished measurements however **27-28-5 version ** * 200g cashmere lamb s wool or fine merino * japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0mm **28-9 version ** * 170g cotton smile * japanese size 4/0 crochet hook 2 5mm 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-9/
